content:
• 55 inch Flat Panel HDTV (stream content from your favorite services to the guestroom TV)
  • In-Room Lap Top Size Safe
  • Pillows: Down, Feather and Foam Available
  • High Speed Wi-Fi – Unlimited Device  Connections (included in the Destination Fee)
  • Luxury Bath Amenities
  • Mini Refrigerator (Available for a Fee  $20/Stay)
  • Workstation with Desk
  • 100% Cotton 250 Thread Count Linens, Triple Sheeting
  • Rollaway Bed (Available for a Fee  $25/Stay)
  • USB Ports
  • Individual Climate Control
  • Garment Steamer
  • Hair Dryer
